sentences.english: I hope you HAs a maximum glad or prosperous New Year.
sentences.chinese: 謹祝新年愉快開心，大吉大利。

sentences.english: I want to send you an old man, I wish you peace in the family the most favorable auspices.
sentences.chinese: 我要送你一個老人，祝你家庭和睦大吉大利。

sentences.english: Good luck to you and your family.
Wishes for a very happy and prosperous New Year.
sentences.chinese: 謹祝新年快樂幸福，大吉大利。

sentences.english: Jida store man love is sweet, forwarding of the National People's Congress.
sentences.chinese: 存儲的人愛情甜蜜，轉發的人大吉大利。

sentences.english: Good luck and great success in the coming year!
sentences.chinese: 祝你在來年大吉大利，成功順利。

sentences.english: "Aye, " said the eagle, "all is well with us.
I hope you get a outstanding glad or prosperous New Year.
sentences.chinese: 謹祝新年愉快開心，大吉大利。
